description:
Pre-order Cozy Grove and receive these exclusive items:
• Ghost bear hood: A Cosgrovian hood that is reminiscent of a revolutionary spirit.
• Ghost sweater: A ghostly sweater that is reminiscent of revolutionary bear spirits.
• Fox hood & fox apron: For only the most dedicated fans of Mr. Kit's brand.
• Cherry blossom flower crown: All young Scouts learn flower crafts during their first spring with the troop.
• Cherry blossom spring dress: These velvet blossoms will last longer than a fleeting spring bloom.
name: Pre-Order Exclusive Outfits!
